rules_text:
Galactic Detonation deals 2 damage to any target.
[i]Augmented[/i] – If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, Galactic Detonation deals 5 damage instead.
flavor_text: [i]Some moments last forever, but some flare out with love, love, love.[/i]
notes:
Love Love Love — The Mountain Goats
